subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Ricky Hatton prevailed in a lopsided decision over Juan Lazcano to retain his International Boxing Organization light-welterweight title before a raucous home crowd in Manchester, England. Hatton won easily on all three judges scorecards. It was his first fight since he lost a World Boxing Council welterweight bid against Floyd Mayweather Jr. in December, his first loss in 44 career fights.
